revised_title: Ernest Howard Griffiths: A Pioneering Physicist and Educator
tldr: Ernest Howard Griffiths was a prominent physicist and educator who made significant contributions to the field of experimental physics in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. He was known for his accurate measurements of important physical constants and his dedication to teaching and mentoring students. Griffiths' work helped to bridge the gap between 19th-century physics and the emerging fields of 20th-century physics, and he was a key figure in the development of modern physics education.
